body.name: Montessori Wooden Busy Board with 8 LED Light switches, Sensory Toys Light Switch Travel Toys for 1+ Year Old Baby and Toddler
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 58 mins
features: 【Well Designed】This busy board is specially designed for toddlers who love switches and LED lights. There are 8 different switches set up on this busy board, and each switch corresponds to a different color or style of LED light. The brightness of each LED is adjusted to be just right for the baby, not too bright, too dazzling or too dark to see clearly.

【Learn and Play】This Montessori Busy Board is the perfect birthday Christmas gift for kids. Toddlers can use this toddler busy board to recognize different colors and sizes. This sensory toy can exercise baby's thinking ability and hands-on ability.Please prepare 2 AAA batteries by yourself before use.

【Size Suitable】The size of this product is 9*1.5*2 inches. This busy board for 1 year old is suitable for different scenarios such as at home, or on the plane, in the car, during travel. This is the perfect travel toy that will make your baby quiet down and do his own thing.

【Strong and Sturdy】Unlike other busyboard production methods on the market, our sensory board is cut in one piece from logs instead of veneer glued. Each baby busy board is carefully ground by hand to ensure a smooth surface. The busy board doesn't have sharp edges or any small parts that come off easily. You don't have to worry about your baby breaking it.

【Satisfied service】If you have any dissatisfaction or questions about this montessori toys, please feel free to contact us, we will reply within 24 hours. This busy board is the perfect toddler toy, a Christmas present to replace screen time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Engaging and Perfect size
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for Christmas for my 1.5 year old. It fit nicely in her stocking too! I really like this busy board, my 1.5yr old AND my 3.5yr old LOVE it. Out of all of their new toys, THIS BUSY BOARD was the main thing they were drawn too. They both wanted to play with it over anything else! It is easy to put batteries in and the rest is up for them to play with and figure out. Its simple, sturdy, safe, and very engaging! Would recommended as a gift to give, or a gift to get for your own little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and portable
reviews.reviewText: My little guy loves this toy!! He loves switching switches on and off and plugging cards in so I thought this would be perfect. It's also great for car rides! Fits perfect in my small diaper bag. Such great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddler is obsessed with this toy!!!
reviews.reviewText: This Montessori busy board has kept my toddler entertained. He’s always looking for ways to press buttons around the house. Now that he has it he takes it wi th him everywhere. Perfect for car rides. The board is noise less which is great as parents are not listening to the constant music throughout the day lol. Also is all wood and the lights are bright enough. It doesn’t come with batteries and need to unscrew the front part to add the batteries. Other than that is a great toy for sensory and hand dexterity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and simple
reviews.reviewText: All 5 of my kids enjoy this thing, from 5 months to 7 years old. The littles just like seeing the lights come on when they do something to the board, but my older kids are curious about switches and electricity and it’s been a great tool to illustrate how certain things work. It’s so simple in design, but can be anything from a motor skills builder for young kids, to a launchpad into switches and electricity for a preteen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars FUN LEARNING WHILE PLAYING!!! Exactly what I would have loved as a kid aged 12-24 months.
reviews.reviewText: Overall Rating: 4/5Installation/setup easiness: 5/5Ease of Use: 5/5Build quality: 5/5Utility: 5/5Child Safety: 2/5 (5/5 with constant parental supervision and oversight)Kids’ play is the WORK that kids do in order to learn skillsets which will be useful for a lifetime.This is an EXCELLENT device which will most probably bring lots of pleasure to any kid aged 12-24 months while the child (i) gets instant cause-effect feedback, (ii) masters eye-hand coordination, and (iii) easily learns new, age-appropriate, critical-thinking skills joyfully without having to work hard.This device has been extensively tested by a child from our neighborhood (aged 12-16 months) who immediately started actuating all the well-located and easy-to-use switches (buttons & plug-ins & keys).-- Even though one of the switches fails intermittently (but NOT frequently, so it’s not a deal breaker), the child has already mastered all the switches except the key-actuated one.WARNING: Some of the small parts (e.g., the keys and cabled plug-in connector) can be very dangerous for young children, especially since they put EVERYTHING into their mouths.-- Consequently, this toy should be used by any child ONLY with constant parental supervision and oversight.In addition, I personally would have preferred that the Busy Board be constructed of soft, lightweight elastomeric (and/or soft plastic) materials such that the only rigid parts would be the light switches & bulbs.-- Why? Because young children have no awareness of the damage they can cause by hitting themselves or other children with the hard wooden board.Other desirable niceties:(i) A camouflaged, sliding, ON-OFF master switch would be a welcome addition (instead of having to turn off all the switches individually).(ii) The battery compartment could be secured via the more commonplace, childproof, sliding closure (instead of using UNNECESSARY screws).Overall, I recommend this product with HIGH enthusiasm (especially if the seller makes the modifications I’ve detailed)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is 17 months and she loves this toy! The construction is fantastic, the switches are fun to manipulate and it is super study. It's also large enough that the dog doesn't think it's a chew toy... so bonus points for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sturdy and quiet toy
reviews.reviewText: I bought this so we could help our child stay entertained while traveling and at church.Likes:- many buttons, switches, and colors to keep them entertained for quite awhile- no sound so it’s not overstimulating!- we have dropped it a few times on soft surfaces and it seems to handle well but I’m not sure about hard surfacesDislikes:- possible it could break quickly dropped on a hard surface, so handle with care!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for in the car.
reviews.reviewText: Great for in the car, in the grocery store, or just quiet time at home. Doesn't make noise but keeps my one-year-old intrigued for quite a while. (or as long as one-year olds attention span can be) She loves the lights and all the different functions. Great alternative to throwing a screen in front of them and gets their brain working. (Only thing, is you have to make sure you turn all the things off one by one after they're done playing with it because it doesn't have a main power switch that turns everything off at once. But that's just to help conserve battery life.)
Es muy buen juguete, mi hija aprende a usar cosas cotidianas y con luz real solo necesita dos pilas AAA que colocan en el frente donde están los tornillos, muy buen producto.

reviews.reviewTitle: My 2 year olds favourite new toy
reviews.reviewText: This busy board has been the biggest hit. Keep my little one occupied and we take it with us when we’re out for meals. Will be buying more as gifts. Love it!

I normally don't write reviews but i have to warn other parents about this toy.From the extreme low quality of the product, i guess this may be a cheap knockoff. The product came in a old plain box without any labels. The wood finish is raw, and full of splinters!!! See attached photos! How can you give this toy to a toddler??!! This is definitely a hazard. I returned it immediately.
